roster.name: Burger Emperor
roster.description: Massive, huge titman, 207 kg of pure fat. Extremely good at the grill.

roster.name: Bruce Yeet
roster.description: Chinese warrior capable of yeeting enemies for over 34 miles. He loves Naruto and Dragon Ball Super.

roster.description: Famous alchemist. His powers: pidgeonmancy, 16h spleeping, food delivery.

roster.name: 0-Shotter

roster.name: Lamezia Terme
roster.description: Literally a town in the Calabria Region, province of Catanzaro.

roster.name: Saluigi
roster.description: Evil alter ego of Samario, who refused to join the tournament.

roster.name: Shiba Inuit
roster.description: Cute dog who trained at -15 degrees. He now controls ice and water.
roster.tecnique_name: Woofuck you, take this ice beam!

roster.name: Sgrunt

roster.description: British gentleman. Despite his name, he's still virgin.

roster.description: Meta definig warrior. Won't be nerfed till next patch.

roster.description: Edgy teenage kid who didn't study english enough, apparently.

roster.name: Geppo
roster.description: Pirate, ninja, mech droid assassin. His motto: 'I'm Geppo'.

roster.name: Bob hole-in-one
roster.description: He's Bob. He never misses.

roster.name: Mr.Y
roster.description: Queer transfemminist powered by xenogender tecniques.

roster.name: Siphylio

roster.name: Cyborg LM-69420
roster.description: A machine from the future. Smells strange.

roster.name: Dimitri Stuprinski

roster.name: Otto von Smegburg

roster.tecnique_name: Katana Slice That Cuts 10 Second Later

roster.name: Edward McFuckers
